content: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Delphi is going where carmakers can only dream of driving. The $23 billion parts maker is spinning off its powertrain unit to focus on connected and autonomous vehicle technology. These fast-growing  higher-margin businesses will sport a top-tier multiple even if car sales slow. The likes of Ford and General Motors don’t have the luxury of following Delphi’s lead.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Breakingviews -Delphi goes where carmakers only dream of driving

content: DETROIT  Feb 5 Delphi Automotive Plc  said sales of advanced vehicle-safety systems would jump 50 percent annually for the next several years  sending the auto supplier's shares up to a record high Thursday.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: UPDATE 1-Delphi expects vehicle safety system sales to jump 50 pct for years

content: DETROIT Delphi Automotive Plc's  incoming chief executive said sales of advanced safety systems related to autonomous driving development will rise 50 percent annually for the next several years.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Delphi sees advanced safety sales rising 50 percent sales next few years

content: DETROIT  Feb 5 Delphi Automotive Plc's  incoming chief exective said sales of advanced safety systems related to autonomous driving development will rise 50 percent annually for the next several years.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Delphi sees advanced safety sales rising 50 pct sales next few years

content: DETROIT Kevin Clark  who will become Delphi Automotive Plc's chief executive on March 1  said the company's active safety systems business will grow by 50 percent this year  from $160 million in 2014.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Delphi Automotive 2015 active safety sales to rise 50 percent: executive

content: DETROIT  Feb 5 Delphi Automotive Plc  late Wednesday night reported earnings that slightly beat Wall Street expectations on strong performance of its electronics and safety systems as well as powertrain businesses.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: CORRECTED-Delphi Automotive quarterly earnings beat expectations

content: FRANKFURT Germany's Mahle has launched a takeover bid for the air conditioning business of U.S. car parts maker Delphi   business daily Handelsblatt said on Thursday without citing sources.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Germany's Mahle seeks to buy Delphi's Thermal business: paper

content: FRANKFURT  Jan 29 Germany's Mahle has launched a takeover bid for the air conditioning business of U.S. car parts maker Delphi  business daily Handelsblatt said on Thursday without citing sources.
name: Delphi Automotive plc
title: Germany's Mahle seeks to buy Delphi's Thermal business -paper
